tr_quotes.quote: Her güne hayatının en güzel günü olması için şans ver.
tr_quotes.author: Mark Twain

tr_quotes.quote: Şans, bir uğraşın eseridir.
tr_quotes.author: Branch Rickey

tr_quotes.quote: Şans, bilgisizliğimizin ikinci adıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Leslie Stephens

tr_quotes.quote: Şans, yakalayanın olur.
tr_quotes.author: Harold S.Geneen

tr_quotes.quote: Şans, hazır olan kafalara yardım eder.
tr_quotes.author: Louis Pasteur

tr_quotes.quote: Talih bize haberci göndermez.
tr_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

tr_quotes.quote: Talih, çalışmak istemeyenlere yardım etmez.
tr_quotes.author: Sophokles

tr_quotes.quote: Fatihler şansa inanmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

tr_quotes.quote: Şans insanlara hâkim olur, insanlar şansa değil.
tr_quotes.author: Herodot

tr_quotes.quote: Şansı olanın, horozu da yumurtlar.
tr_quotes.author: Napoleon

tr_quotes.quote: Şans, cesaretli ve atılganlara güler yüz gösterir.
tr_quotes.author: Erasmus

tr_quotes.quote: Talih, bilgisizliğimizin ikinci adıdır.
tr_quotes.author: L. Stepnens

tr_quotes.quote: Şans kusurları, şansızlıkta değerleri ortaya çıkarır.

tr_quotes.quote: Şans gözü pek olanın yanındadır.

tr_quotes.quote: Şans, hazırlıkla fırsatın karşılaştığı köşe başıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Rus Özdeyişi

tr_quotes.quote: Şans, verimli çalışmaya bağlıdır.
tr_quotes.author: İran atasözleri

tr_quotes.quote: Talih kuşu, en az umanın başına konar.
tr_quotes.author: Garcia Lorca

tr_quotes.quote: Çabuk gelen kötü şans, geç gelen iyi şanstan iyidir.

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanın iyisi, talihin kötüsünde belli olur.

tr_quotes.quote: Bizden başkalarında olan yetenek ve beceriye biz şans deriz.

tr_quotes.quote: Şans, boş bir kelimedir nedensiz hiçbir şey var olamaz.
tr_quotes.author: Voltaire

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanlar kendi çılgın ihtiraslarının neticelerini kadere yüklerler.
tr_quotes.author: Walter Scott

tr_quotes.quote: Eş iste, taç iste, altın iste! İsteyene şans genellikle güler.
tr_quotes.author: Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: Kendi kendilerine yardım etmeyenlere talih bile yardım etmez.

tr_quotes.quote: Bazen istediğin bir şeyin olmaması, senin için bir şanstır.

tr_quotes.quote: Hazırlıkla fırsatın bir araya gelmesi, bizim şans dediğimiz çocuğu doğurur.

tr_quotes.quote: Ne kadar çok çalışırsanız, o kadar çok şanslı olursunuz.
tr_quotes.author: R. David Thomas

tr_quotes.quote: Talihsizliklerin suçu kendimizdedir ancak bunu yaşlandıktan sonra anlarız.
tr_quotes.author: D. Carneige

tr_quotes.quote: Bir şans verilirse, herkesin bir kahraman olacağına inanıyorum.
tr_quotes.author: Ames A. Aurty

tr_quotes.quote: Kimsenin dünyada ikinci bir hayatı olmayacaktır. Bir defa şansınız var ve şimdi.
tr_quotes.author: M. Bozdağ

tr_quotes.quote: Çok kişi iyi şans ister, ama pek az kişi onun peşine düşmeye gönüllüdür.
tr_quotes.author: Alex Rovira

tr_quotes.quote: Karşılarına çıkan fırsatları değerlendiremeyenler, başarının şansta olduğuna inananlardır.
tr_quotes.author: İsmail Ergün

tr_quotes.quote: Hazırlıklı olarak fırsatla karşılaşmak, şans dediğimiz sıçrama tahtasıdır.

tr_quotes.quote: Şansından memnun değilsen maddi ve manevi alışkanlıklarını değiştir, şansın da değişecektir.

tr_quotes.quote: Pratikte iyi ve kötü şans, eş anlamlıdır. Sadece iyi ve kötü seçimler önemlidir.

tr_quotes.quote: Kötü şans insanın ne istediğini bilmemesi ve bilmediği bir şeyi elde etmek uğruna canına kıymasıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Don Herould

tr_quotes.quote: Fikirler, çok uzun yaşayamaz eğer insanın onlar için dövüşecek şansı olmazsa.
tr_quotes.author: Thomas Mann

tr_quotes.quote: Her gün küçük avantajlarla karşılaştırıldığında büyük şanslar insan mutluluğunu nadiren sağlayabilmiştir.

tr_quotes.quote: Başarılı olmak için çaba gösterirsen şans seninledir. Tembeller için şans diye bir şey yoktur.

tr_quotes.quote: Şans bazen şimşek gibi çakabilir ama unutmayın, arkasında sizi kara bulutlar da bekliyor olabilir.
tr_quotes.author: Macar Özdeyişi

tr_quotes.quote: Şansın gerçekleşmesi için, önce siz hazır olmalısınız.
tr_quotes.author: Barrel Royal

tr_quotes.quote: Şanssız insanın haline herkes vah çek meye hazır, fakat o acınışlar kimsenin ta bağrından kopup gelmiş değildir.
tr_quotes.author: Aischylus

tr_quotes.quote: Şansı olanın, horozu da yumurtlar.
tr_quotes.author: Napoleon

tr_quotes.quote: Şans bir aynaya benzer, ona asık suratla bakarsan o da sana aynısını verir. Eğer sen ona gülersen, o da sana güler.
tr_quotes.author: Carl Schutz

tr_quotes.quote: Bazen şans, insanlara mutluluk ve tüm iyi olanaklar için gerekenleri verir. Sadece onlarla kendilerini daha ne kadar mutsuz edebileceğini görmek için.
tr_quotes.author: Donald Marquis

tr_quotes.quote: Şans insana bütün nimetlerini verse, onlardan tat alabilecek bir ruh gerekir. Bizi mutlu eden bir şeyin sahibi olmak değil, tadına varmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Montaigne

tr_quotes.quote: Talih bize haberci göndermez.
tr_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

tr_quotes.quote: Talih, çalışmak istemeyenlere yardım etmez.
tr_quotes.author: Sophokles

tr_quotes.quote: Fatihler şansa inanmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

tr_quotes.quote: Şans insanlara hâkim olur, insanlar şansa değil.
tr_quotes.author: Herodot

tr_quotes.quote: Şansı olanın, horozu da yumurtlar.
tr_quotes.author: Napoleon

tr_quotes.quote: Her güne hayatının en güzel günü olması için şans ver.
tr_quotes.author: Mark Twain

en_quotes.quote: Tea time is a chance to slow down, pull back and appreciate our surroundings

en_quotes.quote: My smile will always be broken, but I'll always be grateful for the chance to get to do what I get to do

en_quotes.quote: When I have a chance to go back to my village, I always remind myself where I came from

en_quotes.quote: Luck is not chance, it's toil; fortune's expensive smile is earned

en_quotes.quote: Absolutely, I think every day is a new day, every day is a new opportunity, and every day is a new chance

en_quotes.quote: There are risks and costs to action. But they are far less than the long range risks of comfortable inaction
en_quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: I think we consider too much the good luck of the early bird and not enough the bad luck of the early worm
en_quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

en_quotes.quote: Growth is never by mere chance; it is the result of forces working together
en_quotes.author: James Cash Penney

en_quotes.quote: Every moment is an organizing opportunity, every person a potential activist, every minute a chance to change the world

en_quotes.quote: Take a chance! All life is a chance. The man who goes farthest is generally the one who is willing to do and dare

en_quotes.quote: To reminisce with my old friends, a chance to share some memories, and play our songs again

en_quotes.quote: Housework can't kill you, but why take a chance?

en_quotes.quote: The flower has opened, has been in the sun and is unafraid. I'm taking more chances; I'm bold and proud

en_quotes.quote: A lie gets halfway around the world before the truth has a chance to get its pants on

en_quotes.quote: When it comes to luck, you make your own

en_quotes.quote: If no one ever took risks, Michaelangelo would have painted the Sistine floor

en_quotes.quote: When I'm ready to fight, my opponent has a better chance of surviving a forest fire wearing gasoline drawers

en_quotes.quote: I mean we all need a second chance sometimes

en_quotes.quote: Suffering by nature or chance never seems so painful as suffering inflicted on us by the arbitrary will of another

en_quotes.quote: It's choice - not chance - that determines your destiny

en_quotes.quote: I will prepare and some day my chance will come

en_quotes.quote: Everything existing in the universe is the fruit of chance and necessity

en_quotes.quote: We are not trying to entertain the critics. I'll take my chances with the public

en_quotes.quote: Children are our second chance to have a great parent-child relationship

en_quotes.quote: I got this second chance at life, and I live it

en_quotes.quote: No man ever wetted clay and then left it, as if there would be bricks by chance and fortune

en_quotes.quote: You know, from my point of view, I'm the luckiest cat on the planet

en_quotes.quote: I'm lucky to have a second chance. Not everyone in life has a second chance, and I do

en_quotes.quote: I'm here today because I refused to be unhappy. I took a chance

en_quotes.quote: When a person cannot deceive himself the chances are against his being able to deceive other people

en_quotes.quote: Good luck is a residue of preparation

en_quotes.quote: Necessity is the mother of taking chances

en_quotes.quote: Take calculated risks. That is quite different from being rash

en_quotes.quote: I don't want to miss out on the chance of having a good time

en_quotes.quote: When men and women are able to respect and accept their differences then love has a chance to blossom

en_quotes.quote: Every existing thing is born without reason, prolongs itself out of weakness, and dies by chance

en_quotes.quote: Chance is a word void of sense; nothing can exist without a cause

en_quotes.quote: You only get one chance at life and you have to grab it boldly

en_quotes.quote: If you ever get a chance to learn how to scuba dive, go do it
en_quotes.author: Scott Michael Foster

en_quotes.quote: You never say never. There's always a chance to do things in the future
en_quotes.author: Nick Cummins

en_quotes.quote: Good luck has its storms
en_quotes.author: George Lucas

en_quotes.quote: True ease in writing comes from art, not chance, as those move easiest who have learn'd to dance

en_quotes.quote: Hateful words stand no chance against self-worth and a little of humor
en_quotes.author: Iskra Lawrence

en_quotes.quote: You hit home runs not by chance but by preparation
en_quotes.author: Roger Maris

en_quotes.quote: There is no chance, no destiny, no fate, that can circumvent or hinder or control the firm resolve of a determined soul

en_quotes.quote: If you don't love the Dodgers, there's a good chance you may not get into Heaven

en_quotes.quote: Desperation is like stealing from the Mafia: you stand a good chance of attracting the wrong attention

en_quotes.quote: My belief is you have one chance to make a first impression

en_quotes.quote: I think we have a good chance of surviving long enough to colonize the solar system

en_quotes.quote: Every time I get the chance, I just talk to myself basically in English just to practice my pronunciation

en_quotes.quote: I prefer to be alive, so I'm cautious about taking risks

en_quotes.quote: Foolishq' from 'Ki & Ka' gave me a chance to work with renowned composer Ilaiyaraaja and Shreya Ghoshal

en_quotes.quote: I've always taken risks, and never worried what the world might really think of me
en_quotes.author: Cher

en_quotes.quote: My father will anticipate everything. He will leave you and me no chance to do a great and brilliant deed

en_quotes.quote: I never quit trying. I never felt that I didn't have a chance to win

en_quotes.quote: I believe you only have one chance on this earth, and I'm just trying to live my life and do what makes me happy

en_quotes.quote: I have a second chance on life

en_quotes.quote: If you keep on saying things are going to be bad, you have a good chance of being a prophet

en_quotes.quote: I want the world to know that everybody deserves a second chance
en_quotes.author: El DeBarge

en_quotes.quote: If one has curiosity, then one stands the chance of attain a high level of scientific inquiry
en_quotes.author: Ada Yonath

en_quotes.quote: I never pass up the chance to shop at vintage stores
en_quotes.author: Fei Fei Sun

en_quotes.quote: All we are saying is give peace a chance

en_quotes.quote: I have as much chance of becoming Prime Minister as of being decapitated by a frisbee or of finding Elvis

en_quotes.quote: Nowadays love is a matter of chance, matrimony a matter of money and divorce a matter of course

en_quotes.quote: Valor is of no service, chance rules all, and the bravest often fall by the hands of cowards

en_quotes.quote: From now until the end of time no one else will ever see life with my eyes, and I mean to make the best of my chance

en_quotes.quote: Work for something because it is good, not just because it stands a chance to succeed

en_quotes.quote: My job is to give my team a chance to win

en_quotes.quote: The public health of five million children should not be left to luck or chance
en_quotes.author: Jamie Oliver

en_quotes.quote: Everybody can see that my swing is homegrown. That means everybody has a chance to do it
en_quotes.author: Bubba Watson

en_quotes.quote: When I do get the chance I just love to hang around at home with friends and family

en_quotes.quote: Hold puppies, kittens, and babies anytime you get the chance
en_quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: Treat all men alike. Give them the same law. Give them an even chance to live and grow
en_quotes.author: Chief Joseph

en_quotes.quote: Luck is always the last refuge of laziness and incompetence
en_quotes.author: James Cash Penney

en_quotes.quote: Luck, that's when preparation and opportunity meet
en_quotes.author: Pierre Trudeau

en_quotes.quote: Encore' was an experiment. 'Encore' was the second chance at a first impression. 'Encore' was not completely planned
en_quotes.author: Hunter Hayes

en_quotes.quote: I was a good football player, and I had a chance to play with some great players

en_quotes.quote: In my life, I've been able to really examine society in a way most people who aren't outsiders don't get a chance to do
en_quotes.author: RuPaul

en_quotes.quote: Nothing is as obnoxious as other people's luck

en_quotes.quote: One of my big regrets is that Facebook hasn't had a major chance to shape the mobile operating system ecosystem
en_quotes.author: Mark Zuckerberg

en_quotes.quote: Listen, we elected Warren G. Harding. Anybody has a chance
en_quotes.author: Roger Ailes

en_quotes.quote: Great risks come in long term, tremendously assiduous, very courageous study
en_quotes.author: William Hurt

en_quotes.quote: Events are not a matter of chance
en_quotes.author: Gamal Abdel Nasser

en_quotes.quote: It seemed to me that this might be a great pageant, which would give a chance for a very interesting picture
en_quotes.author: Henry Ossawa Tanner

en_quotes.quote: War never takes a wicked man by chance, the good man always
en_quotes.author: Sophocles

en_quotes.quote: Balance provides the chance for longevity. You can be a champion at work and at home
en_quotes.author: Tony Dungy

en_quotes.quote: When you have the chance to play a Champions League final, you have to win it
en_quotes.author: Gianluigi Buffon

en_quotes.quote: Give yourself a chance. Now, everyone can't play basketball. But find something you're interested in
en_quotes.author: Muggsy Bogues

en_quotes.quote: Freedom is nothing but a chance to be better
en_quotes.author: Albert Camus

en_quotes.quote: Do you want to be safe and good, or do you want to take a chance and be great?
en_quotes.author: Jimmy Johnson

en_quotes.quote: Since there is nothing so well worth having as friends, never lose a chance to make them
en_quotes.author: Francesco Guicciardini

en_quotes.quote: The risk of a wrong decision is preferable to the terror of indecision
en_quotes.author: Maimonides

en_quotes.quote: Chance has never yet satisfied the hope of a suffering people
en_quotes.author: Marcus Garvey

en_quotes.quote: There is no chance and anarchy in the universe. All is system and gradation. Every god is there sitting in his sphere
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: As a rock star, I have two instincts, I want to have fun, and I want to change the world. I have a chance to do both
en_quotes.author: Bono

en_quotes.quote: Read the best books first, or you may not have a chance to read them at all
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: If there is anything that a man can do well, I say let him do it. Give him a chance
en_quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

en_quotes.quote: Everyone deserves a second chance. That's just the way I am
en_quotes.author: Booker T

en_quotes.quote: Nobody owes anybody a living, but everybody is entitled to a chance
en_quotes.author: Jack Dempsey

en_quotes.quote: Living at risk is jumping off the cliff and building your wings on the way down
en_quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

en_quotes.quote: Everybody deserves a second chance in this world. That's basically all I ask
en_quotes.author: Shannen Doherty

en_quotes.quote: Every business and every product has risks. You can't get around it
en_quotes.author: Lee Iacocca

en_quotes.quote: The history of free men is never really written by chance but by choice; their choice!
en_quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

en_quotes.quote: If you have a dream, give it a chance to happen
en_quotes.author: Richard M. DeVos

en_quotes.quote: I figure you have the same chance of winning the lottery whether you play or not
en_quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

en_quotes.quote: Nothing happens quite by chance. It's a question of accretion of information and experience
en_quotes.author: Jonas Salk

en_quotes.quote: Mama is my chance to be a stand-up comedian. In my mind, it's my chance to be Chris Rock
en_quotes.author: Vicki Lawrence

en_quotes.quote: My whole story is just about me having a second chance
en_quotes.author: Two Chainz

en_quotes.quote: It's true hard work never killed anybody, but I figure, why take the chance?
en_quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

en_quotes.quote: There is no such thing as chance; and what seem to us merest accident springs from the deepest source of destiny
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

en_quotes.quote: Weather forecast for Jupiter's South Equatorial Belt: cloudy with a chance of ammonia
en_quotes.author: Heidi Hammel

en_quotes.quote: The right time is any time that one is still so lucky as to have
en_quotes.author: Henry James

en_quotes.quote: Poker is a skill game pretending to be a chance game
en_quotes.author: James Altucher

en_quotes.quote: But we also believe in taking risks, because that's how you move things along
en_quotes.author: Melinda Gates

en_quotes.quote: If you're so afraid of failure, you will never succeed. You have to take chances
en_quotes.author: Mario Andretti

en_quotes.quote: Everyone has a chance to learn, improve, and build up their skills
en_quotes.author: Tom Peters

en_quotes.quote: In battle, you forgive a man anything except an unwillingness to take risks. Sometimes you have to put it on the line

en_quotes.quote: Brevity is the soul of wit

en_quotes.quote: The best way to solve problems and to fight against war is through dialogue

en_quotes.quote: Everything becomes a little different as soon as it is spoken out loud
